metadata.title: CVE-2023-4727 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in dogtag-pki and pki-core. The token authenticationscheme can be bypassed with a LDAP injection. By passing the query stringparameter sessionID=*, an attacker can authenticate with an existingsession saved in the LDAP directory server, which may lead to escalation ofprivilege.

criterions.comment: dogtag-pki package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
